sentences.sentence: Financial planers help individuals and businesses organize their financial affairs.
sentences.translation: 理财师帮助个人和企业组织他们的财务事项。

sentences.sentence: The traffic managers and planers will face the problem of evaluating effectiveness of schemes when they make the traffic observation system.
sentences.translation: 相关人员在设计交通观测系统建设方案时，要面临如何评价方案的实施效果问题。
